rules.name: HABU Analysis Required
rules.messageTemplate: Highest and Best Use analysis is required for all appraisal orders.

rules.name: Four Tests Analysis Complete
rules.messageTemplate: All four tests (Physically Possible, Legally Permissible, Financially Feasible, Maximally Productive) must be completed.

rules.name: Zoning Information Required
rules.messageTemplate: Zoning information and allowed uses must be verified for legal permissibility analysis.

rules.name: Minimum Candidate Uses
rules.messageTemplate: At least two candidate uses must be analyzed for proper HABU comparison. Current count: {actual}.

rules.name: Site Area Specification
rules.messageTemplate: Site area in square feet is required for physical possibility analysis.

rules.name: Utilities Assessment Required
rules.messageTemplate: Utility availability (water, sewer, electric, gas) must be assessed for development feasibility.

rules.name: Market Signals Required
rules.messageTemplate: Market signals are required for financial feasibility analysis.

rules.name: Zoning Conflict Validation
rules.messageTemplate: Zoning conflicts detected in HABU analysis. All candidate uses must be legally permissible.

rules.name: HABU Conclusion Confidence
rules.messageTemplate: HABU conclusion confidence is {actual}. Consider strengthening analysis if below 70%.

rules.name: Test Weights Balance
rules.messageTemplate: Legal test weight is {actual}. Consider increasing emphasis on legal permissibility (recommend ≥25%).

rules.name: HABU Narrative Documentation
rules.messageTemplate: HABU conclusion must include narrative explanation supporting the highest and best use determination.

rules.name: As-Improved Analysis Consistency
rules.messageTemplate: When analyzing as-improved, ensure building characteristics (GLA, year built, condition) are provided.

rules.name: Physical Constraints Documentation
rules.messageTemplate: Physical site constraints identified. Ensure thorough documentation of topography, access, and development limitations.

rules.name: Financial Feasibility Data Quality
rules.messageTemplate: Market inventory data is required for accurate financial feasibility assessment.

rules.name: Maximally Productive Test Ranking
rules.messageTemplate: Highest ranked use has composite score of {actual}. Verify analysis methodology if top use scores below 50%.

rules.name: HABU Analysis Version Control
rules.messageTemplate: HABU analysis should be version tracked for audit purposes.

rules.name: HABU Analysis Currency
rules.messageTemplate: HABU analysis date is {actual}. Ensure analysis reflects current market conditions.

rules.name: Supportable HABU Conclusion
rules.messageTemplate: Highest ranked use must score ≥60% on all four tests. Review analysis for use with failing test scores.

rules.name: Alternative Uses Consideration
rules.messageTemplate: Consider analyzing additional alternative uses for comprehensive HABU study. Current: {actual} uses.
